response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which holds immense value and potential for growth. Our product has been meticulously designed to cater to the needs of forward-thinking individuals like yourself. I understand that its true worth may be subjective, but I firmly believe it is valued at $1,200,000. This investment could potentially open doors to new opportunities and advancements in your field. I am confident that with the right application, this product can significantly enhance your business or personal endeavors. Let's discuss how we can make this valuable asset yours.", "product_price": 1200000}
